entry.title: $2595 // Luxury UWS 1BR-DM/Elev/Lndry/Gym/Rfdk-Central Prk-EXTRA LOW FEE!
entry.content:
Luxury UWS 1BR-DM/Elevator/Laundry/Gym/Rfdk-Central Park-EXTREMELY LOW FEE!

Listing ID #: 494947
Price: $2,595
Property Type: Apartment
Bedrooms: 1.0
Bathrooms: 1.0
Pets: Pets OK

Building Amenities

Doorman
Elevator
Garage
Diplomats OK
Laundry
Valet
Roof Deck
Concierge

Apartment Amenities

Hardwood
High Ceilings
Renovated
Granite Kitchen
Light
Original Details
Open View

This is a MUST SEE! Beautiful 1 Bedroom situated in a luxury building across from Central Park. The best of Upper West Side living in a Doorman/Elevator/Laundry building with Roofdeck and Garage parking. Bright and airy with gorgeous views of the park, high ceilings and hardwood floors. Fully renovated kitchen with Stainless Steel Appliances and bathroom with all-new fixtures. Step into a stylishly renovated secure lobby. Work out in the state-of-the-art Gym and Fitness Center. Lightning quick access to B/C/1 Trains.

-ELEVATOR -EVENING LOBBY ATTENDANT -FITNESS CENTER -LAUNDRY -LIVE-IN SUPERINTENDENT -ASSIGNED SPACE PARKING AVAILABLE -24/7 CCTV VISUAL ENTRY SYSTEM

PLEASE CONTACT MURPHY FOR ADDITIONAL DETAILS AND ARRANGE A TIME TO CHECK OUT THIS BEAUTY - ID# 494947 - CALL 917-691-4045
